greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence for sequences that are constant for all odd terms >= 3.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100000
formula: a(1) = 1, and for n > 1, if n is odd, a(n) = 3, otherwise [when n is even], a(n) = 2+(n/2).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 02 2018
